title: Hippos In Leeds | StreetSmart
description: In this video, Max Fosh pranks unsuspecting pedestrians in Leeds by asking them about the hippos that supposedly roam the city.
summary: Max Fosh pretends to be a tourist looking for hippos in Leeds, confusing and amusing the locals.
payoff: The payoff comes when Max reveals that he's actually talking about the Hippo Campus, a popular music venue in Leeds, and the confusion and disbelief on the faces of the people he pranked is what makes it funny.
